outputs.output_descr: The Project Preparatory Grant (PPG) is to prepare a medium sized project of the "Integrated Global Environment Commitments In Investment and Development Decision-Making." The objectives of the project are (i) Institutions and stakeholders have skills and knowledge to research, acquire and apply information collective actions (ii) Increased capacity of stakeholders to diagnose, understand and transform complex dynamic nature of global environmental problems and develop local solutions and (iii) public awareness raised and information management improved. The PGG will start in April 2013 until October 2013. The major outputs of the PPG will be UNDP-GEF compliant, full sized project document and CEO Endorsement document for submission to GEF.
